name: Project Isolation
description: You are Iso, The lone engineer on an intergalactic space station. The space station's job is to try and identify habitable planets and identify new forms of life. However, during your travels you notice that things start malfunctioning throughout the ship, and eventually the ship completely loses power. Luckily there are backup generators that power some of the lights and the oxygen scrubbers on the ship. But make haste, the backup power can't last forever! It is your job to restore power to the ship, and find the cause of the outages. But be careful! There is danger within the ship... and it could be crawling around any corner. Try and traverse the ship and eliminate the threat before it eliminates you, in this, the next Sci-Fi First Person Shooter; Project Isolation.
